tasks.task: Load hay from trailer onto storage racks
subtasks: Drive tractor equipped with hay loader
Hitch hay loader to tractor
Position tractor under pile of hay in trailer
Lower hay loader bucket to collect hay from trailer
Raise hay loader bucket to transport hay to storage area
Drive tractor to storage racks
Align trailer load with storage racks
Lower hay loader bucket onto storage racks to unload hay
Repeat process until all hay is transferred
Use tractor chain to tie down hay bales
Check secured hay for stability and adjust as needed

tasks.task: Drive tractor with attached hay baler to field
subtasks: Navigate tractor and baler through field rows
Operate hay baler to cut, tie, and form hay bales
Collect formed hay bales and stack temporarily on tractor

tasks.task: Transfer hay from tractor to trailer
subtasks: Unload hay bales from tractor and place in trailer
Secure hay bales in trailer to prevent shifting
Cover hay in trailer to protect from weather

tasks.task: Drive tractor and baler back to storage area
subtasks: Position tractor in desired location for hay storage
Offload any remaining hay from trailer to storage racks
Inspect agricultural equipment for needed maintenance
Refuel tractor and hay baler as necessary
Organize tools and supplies for day's tasks
